Method Detail

parseComponent

public static Component parseComponent(CSVEntry csvEntry,
                                       int index)
Returns the correct Component subtype for the particular CSVEntry.

Parameters:
csvEntry - The cell in the input csv.
index - The relative index of this component in relation to its containing logical unit. If the entry being parsed is part of a Question, then the relative index is in relation to the other components that comprise this question. (This is legacy from the deprecated RESOURCE column header.

If the entry being parsed is an answer option, then the index is the relative index in the chunk of the csv that corresponds to its containing question.
Returns:
The correct Component subtype for this csv entry.

cleanStrId

public String cleanStrId(String id)
Removes randomization prefix flags.

Parameters:
id - The string representation of the block identifier
Returns:
The string representation of the block identifier, without the randomization flags.

getAllBlockLookUp

public Map<String,Block> getAllBlockLookUp()
Returns a map of all blocks, including top-level-blocks, sub-blocks, and "phantom" blocks.

Returns:
A map from the Blocks' string identifiers to their internal representations.

parse

public Survey parse()
             throws SurveyException
Parses the csv lexed by the input to the CSVParser's constructor. This method does the following:

  • Sets the survey encoding according to the encoding set by the CSVLexer.
  • Sets the survey source file name according to the source file set by the CSVLexer
  • Sets the survey source name, which is used as a prefix for some backends and is determined by the source file name.
  • Sets the list of top level questions in the survey.
  • Sets the map of all blocks and the list of top level blocks.
  • Sets the branch destinations and block types.
  • Sets the correlation map
  • Sets the headers that are not semantically meaningful to SurveyMan ("otherHeaders").

Specified by:
parse in class AbstractParser
Returns:
A Survey object
Throws:
SurveyException
